chrome.notes: Starting in Chrome 37, this method is a no-op and has no effect.

safari.notes: Since August 2015 this method is a no-op in WebKit-based browsers.

samsunginternet_android.notes: Starting in Samsung Internet 3.0, this method is a no-op and has no effect.

webview_android.notes: Starting in WebView 37, this method is a no-op and has no effect.
